text: @ChrisCuomo @NYGovCuomo What a clown show. It’s all fun and games to you two gutless jerks. Why don’t you do some actual “journalism” and ask your brother why he IRRESPONSIBLY sent #COVID19 patients back to #nursinghomes where they and residents they infected DIED.....On HIS watch?
